TextEng: It's about time you showed up, old man.
And what is that?
And just how are we supposed to stop Heurodis?
But what is Heurodis doing here in these ruins?
Text: 헤우로디스는 이 폐허에서 뭘 하는 거죠?

TextEng: Then we're too late. She's already used this portal.
Text: 그럼 늦었네요. 이미 차원문을 사용한 거잖아요.

TextEng: Very well. I'll do what I can.
Forget it! I'm not taking part in this mad plan!
Text: 싫어요! 이런 미친 계획에는 참여 안 해요!

TextEng: No, I suppose not.
Wait! Why don't we join her and gain some power for ourselves?
Text: 잠깐! 우리도 그녀와 손잡고 힘을 얻는 건 어때요?

TextEng: How are we supposed to defeat her once we are there?
Text: 거기 가서 어떻게 그녀를 물리치라는 거예요?

TextEng: Destroy the mythallar? Never!
And what would happen to us?
That's cold comfort, old man, but I suppose it will have to do.
Thank you. I appreciate that thought.
I agree. She must be stopped, whatever the cost.
Text: 동의해요. 무슨 대가를 치르더라도 그녀를 막아야 해요.

TextEng: What if we go through the portal but can't get back?
Well, you're here now... you don't need me anymore.
Text: 이제 여기 오셨으니... 더 이상 저는 필요 없겠네요.

TextEng: So Heurodis gains great power. Why do we care?
Text: 헤우로디스가 엄청난 힘을 얻는다고요. 그게 우리랑 무슨 상관인데요?

TextEng: What do you propose we do, then?
And you waited all this time to inform me of this?
How could Heurodis have escaped notice for so long?
Text: 헤우로디스가 어떻게 그렇게 오래 숨어 있을 수 있었죠?

TextEng: So Garrick reached you after all.
Master Drogan! You made it!
What's happened?!
Aren't you coming?
So, this... this is it, then?
You were always a fool, old man! And now you're a dead fool!
Text: 당신은 항상 바보였어, 노인장! 이제는 죽은 바보가 됐고!

TextEng: You don't have to tell me twice! Move aside!
Text: 두 번 말 안 해도 돼요! 비켜요!

TextEng: I will stop her, Master Drogan! I promise you that!
No! You can't do this! There must be some other way!
Text: 안 돼요! 이럴 수는 없어요! 다른 방법이 있을 거예요!

TextEng: It won't come to that, I'm sure.
I'll do my best, Master Drogan.
Destroy it? Destroy it how?!
But that will kill *me*! Forget it, I'm not doing this!
Text: 하지만 그건 *저*를 죽일 거예요! 싫어요, 이런 건 안 할 거예요!

TextEng: And kill *me*! Forget it, I'm not doing this!
Text: 그리고 *저*를 죽이겠죠! 싫어요, 이런 건 안 할 거예요!
